<<<<<<< HEAD
An epitaph upon His late Majesty, King Charles the II.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, in Pye-Corner:, [London] : 1685.
Verse: "The statue, which the Rhodians say,". Place of publication and printer's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
